titleStmt.title: An holy panegyrick a sermon preached at Paules Crosse vpon the anniuersarie solemnitie of the happie inauguration of our dread soueraigne Lord King James, Mar. 24, 1613 / by J.H.D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Pindley for Samuel Macham,
